name: Thought Heap
description: A no framework browser based app for tracking thoughts that allows for multiple lists where thoughts can be created, edited, and deleted. Lists are saved to local storage (for demo purposes) and the last viewed list is displayed on next visit.

name: Web Calc
description: A browser based calculator that can handle multiple operators at a time, respects order of operations, and can be installed as a Progressive Web App (PWA).

name: This Portfolio
description: A statically generated portfolio site using GraphQL to pull in each projects data at build time. It's probably a little over engineered but it was fun to make.
